plot: The "Class Black," 10th Grade of Myōjō Academy is composed of 12 assassins disguised as students and one target: Haru Ichinose. Fully aware of being the prey, Ichinose vows to survive assassination attempts and graduate from the school alive. One of the assassins, Tokaku Azuma, has started building up feelings for Ichinose and switched side to become her protector. Together they have to face the onslaught from their classmates of 11 assassins.
ending_theme: "Kinō, Kyō, Ashita" (昨日、今日、明日; Yesterday, Today, Tomorrow) by Hisako Kanemoto (ep 2)
"Dōtte kotonai Sympathy" (どうってことない Sympathy, I Don't Need Your Sympathy) by Fumiko Uchimura (ep 5)
"Poison Me" by Sachika Misawa & Mami Uchida (ep 6)
"Suzukaze" (すずかぜ Cold Wind) by Chika Anzai (ep 7)
"Mayonaka no Tōbō" (真夜中の逃亡, Moonlight Fugitive) by Yuka Ōtsubo (ep 8)
"Tenshi no Smile♥" (天使のスマイル♥, Angel's Smile) by Azumi Asakura (ep 9)
"Inochi no Karakuri" (イノチノカラクリ The Mechanical Workings of Life) by Miho Arakawa (ep 10)
"QUEEN" by Ayaka Suwa, Hisako Kanemoto, Manami Nakamura, Haruka Yoshimura, Fumiko Uchimura, Sachika Misawa, Mami Uchida, Chika Anzai, Yuka Ōtsubo, Azumi Asakura, Miho Arakwa, Yūki Yamada (ep 12)
